name: James Spring: Finding Friends
description:
Can you find all James' friends? Let's find them!

Where is everyone? Let's play hide and seek!
Make James go as far as possible!
Find as many James' friends as you can!

- Run James as far as possible with simple touch controls
- Find and Uncover rest of the James' friends
- Watch out cute but dangerous enemies
- Travel beautiful designed worlds
- Enjoy addictive sound effects
- Free!

Share your best score and tag #JamesSpring

Get the Latest News from Facebook page!
http://www.facebook.com/kkirukstudio
